entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
